column4: when i go to my dyndns host it only shows me my router's web login. dyndns.com says this is a 'loopback connection error' but i have no idea what to do to fix it
your client asks the dyndns-service to resolve the dyndns-address according to your current ip
: so is there a way to foward any requests to my server machine on the other side of the nat?
i think i have the answer :P thanks
